events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to poor fit.
Customer support agent John has been assigned to handle this refund case promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 789456123. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached and packed exactly as delivered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a refund once the jacket is received in our warehouse. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response and sending the prepaid label. I appreciate the smooth process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Since the refund has been completed and you confirmed satisfaction, we are closing this support case. Thanks for contacting us!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
